entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
